RelatedSentence: A federal court in Manhattan found Egyptian Islamic cleric Mustafa Kamel Mustafa guilty of providing support to terrorist organizations in Yemen and the United States .

A0: Egyptian Islamic cleric Mustafa Kamel Mustafa
RelatedSentence: Mustafa , referred to in court by his alias Abu Hamza al - Masri , was found guilty on all 11 counts of terrorism .
The cleric allegedly sent men to form an al - Qaida training camp in Oregon , sent one man to Afghanistan for training , and assisted kidnappers in Yemen by allowing them to use a satellite phone .

His passionate anti-Western sermons attracted Islamic extremists to his London mosque before and after the 9/11 attacks .
Among those who reportedly attended his services were two 9/11 conspirators , although Mustafa denied meeting the men .
